SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_COUNTRY_QUOTAOVERRIDE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determine if the country has the quota override trigger set to yes
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_COUNTRY_QUOTAOVERRIDE( @countryID uniqueidentifier -- Country Extension ID (same as the Constituent ID) of the country to check the override trigger for ) returns bit with execute as caller as begin
declare @overrideTriggerStatusCode bit = 0
select @overrideTriggerStatusCode = OVERRIDETRIGGERSTATUSCODE from dbo.USR_COUNTRYEXTENSION where ID = @countryID
return @overrideTriggerStatusCode
end
